verses.verse: Know <S%G50><s%> you not, brothers, <S%G80><s%> (for I speak <S%G2980><s%> to them that know <S%G1097><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%>) how that the law <S%G3551><s%> has dominion <S%G2961><s%> over a man <S%G444><s%> as long <S%G5550><s%> as he lives? <S%G2198><s%>

For the woman <S%G1135><s%> which has <S%G5220><s%> an husband <S%G5220><s%> is bound <S%G1210><s%> by the law <S%G3551><s%> to her husband <S%G435><s%> so long as he lives; <S%G2198><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> be dead, <S%G599><s%> she is loosed <S%G2673><s%> from the law <S%G3551><s%> of her husband. <S%G435><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> if, <S%G1437><s%> while her husband <S%G435><s%> lives, <S%G2198><s%> she be married <S%G1096><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> she shall be called <S%G5537><s%> an adulteress: <S%G3428><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> her husband <S%G435><s%> be dead, <S%G599><s%> she is free <S%G1658><s%> from that law; <S%G3551><s%> so that she is no <S%G3361><s%> adulteress, <S%G3428><s%> though she be married <S%G1096><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> man. <S%G435><s%>

Why, <S%G5620><s%> my brothers, <S%G80><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> are become <S%G2289><s%> dead <S%G2289><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> by the body <S%G4983><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%> that you should be married <S%G1096><s%> to another, <S%G2087><s%> even to him who is raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> that we should bring <S%G2592><s%> forth fruit <S%G2592><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

For when <S%G3753><s%> we were in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> the motions <S%G3804><s%> of sins, <S%G266><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were by the law, <S%G3551><s%> did work <S%G1754><s%> in our members <S%G3196><s%> to bring <S%G2592><s%> forth fruit <S%G2592><s%> to death. <S%G2288><s%>

But now <S%G3570><s%> we are delivered <S%G2673><s%> from the law, <S%G3551><s%> that being dead <S%G599><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> we were held; <S%G2722><s%> that we should serve <S%G1398><s%> in newness <S%G2538><s%> of spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and not in the oldness <S%G3821><s%> of the letter. <S%G1121><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> Is the law <S%G3551><s%> sin? <S%G266><s%> God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid. <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> No, <S%G235><s%> I had not known <S%G1097><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> but by the law: <S%G3551><s%> for I had not known <S%G1492><s%> lust, <S%G1939><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> had said, <S%G3004><s%> You shall not covet. <S%G1937><s%>

But sin, <S%G266><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> by the commandment, <S%G1785><s%> worked <S%G2716><s%> in me all <S%G3956><s%> manner of concupiscence. <S%G1939><s%> For without <S%G5565><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> was dead. <S%G3498><s%>

For I was alive <S%G2198><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> once: <S%G4218><s%> but when the commandment <S%G1785><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> revived, <S%G326><s%> and I died. <S%G599><s%>
And the commandment, <S%G1785><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was ordained to life, <S%G2222><s%> I found <S%G2147><s%> to be to death. <S%G2288><s%>
For sin, <S%G266><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> by the commandment, <S%G1785><s%> deceived <S%G1818><s%> me, and by it slew <S%G615><s%> me.
Why <S%G5620><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is holy, <S%G40><s%> and the commandment <S%G1785><s%> holy, <S%G40><s%> and just, <S%G1342><s%> and good. <S%G18><s%>

Was then <S%G3767><s%> that which is good <S%G18><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> to me? God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid. <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> But sin, <S%G266><s%> that it might appear <S%G5316><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> working <S%G2716><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> in me by that which is good; <S%G18><s%> that sin <S%G266><s%> by the commandment <S%G1785><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> exceeding <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236><s%> sinful. <S%G268><s%>
For we know <S%G1492><s%> that the law <S%G3551><s%> is spiritual: <S%G4152><s%> but I am <S%G1510><s%> carnal, <S%G4559><s%> sold <S%G4097><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

For that which <S%G3739><s%> I do <S%G2716><s%> I allow <S%G1097><s%> not: for what <S%G3739><s%> I would, <S%G2309><s%> that do <S%G4238><s%> I not; but what <S%G3739><s%> I hate, <S%G3404><s%> that do <S%G4160><s%> I.
If <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not, I consent <S%G4852><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> that it is good. <S%G2570><s%>
Now <S%G3570><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> it is no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> I that do <S%G2716><s%> it, but sin <S%G266><s%> that dwells <S%G3611><s%> in me.

For I know <S%G1492><s%> that in me (that is, in my flesh, <S%G4561><s%>) dwells <S%G3611><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing: for to will <S%G2309><s%> is present <S%G3873><s%> with me; but how to perform <S%G2716><s%> that which is good <S%G2570><s%> I find <S%G2147><s%> not.
For the good <S%G18><s%> that I would <S%G2309><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> not: but the evil <S%G2556><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not, that I do. <S%G4238><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> that I would <S%G2309><s%> not, it is no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> I that do <S%G2716><s%> it, but sin <S%G266><s%> that dwells <S%G3611><s%> in me.
I find <S%G2147><s%> then <S%G686><s%> a law, <S%G3551><s%> that, when I would <S%G2309><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> good, <S%G2570><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> is present <S%G3873><s%> with me.
For I delight <S%G4913><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the inward <S%G2080><s%> man: <S%G444><s%>

But I see <S%G991><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> in my members, <S%G3196><s%> warring <S%G497><s%> against <S%G497><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of my mind, <S%G3563><s%> and bringing <S%G163><s%> me into captivity <S%G163><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in my members. <S%G3196><s%>
O wretched <S%G5005><s%> man <S%G444><s%> that I am! who <S%G5101><s%> shall deliver <S%G4506><s%> me from the body <S%G4983><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> death? <S%G2288><s%>

I thank <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%> So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> with the mind <S%G3563><s%> I myself serve <S%G1398><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> but with the flesh <S%G4561><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>
